The Quranic researcher, the earth, the earth, that is, in the masses, as Ibn Abbas said a budget, elegant, with the slurring of the plant, smaller, old, shape, and form.It was said: Its slit is in the Lord, and its chain of transmission to its guarantee is a metaphor from the chapter on the chain of transmission, and if God is glorified and glorified, the found is a truth, then it is a reason for it.The verb is a fact for those who did it, not those who have issued a find, and this is the derivation of the name of the perpetrator for him, and it is followed by the word of the word and then.
